title: Arbroath smokie fish cakes with chive sauce
description: Treat yourself to James Martin's easy fishcakes made with the king of smoked fish, Arbroath smokies.
ingredients: 4 Arbroath smokies, or other smoked fish
450g/1lb floury potatoes (such as King Edward or Maris Piper), peeled and cut into chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 handfuls mizuna leaves or other micro salad leaves, to serve
